Context:
The "How to Pay for College" info session covers topics such as budgeting, OSAP ( Ontarioc Student Assistance Program), student loans, scholarships, bursaries and grants. For further information or inquiries, you can contact ask.george@georgebrown.ca or call 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559). You can also visit the college's social media hub for updates on application deadlines, news, events, tours and more.

Contact Information:
Email: ask.george@georgebrown.ca
Phone number: 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559)
Social Media Hub: Visit Our Social Media Hub

Programs and Sessions covered in the Info session: Budgeting, OSAP, Student loans, Scholarships, Bursaries, Grants.

Note: The information contained in this website is subject to change without notice. It should not be viewed as a representation, offer or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
